org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Collider
      • org.turkudragons.SpaceHunter.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Alien, Blockade_Barrel, Dragonling_Drone, Flame_Tank, Mecha_Dragon, Player

    public class Character
extends Collider
    Character is walking, jumping and shooting being that also can have an ability to fly. This is mostly used as an abstract for the enemies and is not used because it is not Active or Visible.
    Author:
    Pasi, Santeri

      • shoot

        public void shoot(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> oList,
                  int x,
                  int y)
        A shooting method that fires a bullet at the cooridnates given, originating from the centre of the Character.
        Parameters:
        oList - list of objects in the gamestate
        x - the x-position where the bullet is created
        y - the y-position where the bullet is created

      • shoot

        public void shoot(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> oList,
                  int x,
                  int y,
                  int destX,
                  int destY)
        A shooting method that allows a defined hotspot.
        Parameters:
        oList - Object List
        x - X-Coordinate
        y - Y-Coordinate
        destX - xoffset of hotspot
        destY - yoffset of hotspot

      • shoot

        public void shoot(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> oList,
                  int xTarget,
                  int yTarget,
                  boolean kk)
        A shooting method that can be given an additional boolean for more constant firing. Used by aiming.
        Parameters:
        oList - Object List
        x - X-Coordinate
        y - Y-Coordinate
        kk - Is a dummy bullet
